mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comm_no, board_no, mem_no, comm_content, comm_date) VALUES (comments_seq.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{commContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT c.comm_no AS commNo, c.board_no AS boardNo, c.mem_no AS memNo, m.mem_id AS memId, c.comm_content AS commContent, c.comm_date AS commDate, c.comm_update AS commUpdate FROM comments c LEFT JOIN member m ON c.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE c.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.comm_no ASC
